title: Gray Sin
description: —JOE—I was doing my job when I rescued Gracyn. But I shouldhave known better than to bring her back to my cabin.She has a reputation for getting whatever she wants. I’dnever considered she’d be interested in someone as oldas her father. I wasn’t attracted to anyone so young untilthat night. Now I’m in bed with the devil, trying to keepmy buddies from finding out that she’s everything I everwanted. —GRACYN—Joe was another one of my parents' friends not worthpaying attention to until he saves me from myself. It wasonly supposed to be one sinful night. Now, I temp fateeach time I go back for more. I’ve fallen for a much olderman and we’re treading in gray waters. To keep him I’llhave to come clean to my family. But does friendshipeclipse love?
author: Jody Kaye
